wiki.content:
"You Make My Dreams" is a 1980 single by Hall & Oates from their album Voices. The song reached number five on the Pop Singles chart in 1981. Vocals from Hall & Oates "You Make My Dreams" were later sampled on R&B singer Amerie's song "Take Control". American pop rock band Mêlée included a cover version of "You Make My Dreams" on their album Devils & Angels.
 
 It has been featured in the television shows The Office, Cupid, and Glee, as well as the movies Step Brothers, the documentary My Date With Drew, and The Wedding Singer.
 
 The song made a minor comeback in 2009 when it was featured prominently in the indie Sundance hit film 500 Days of Summer, in the hit comedy-musical show Glee and in the medical drama Private Practice.
 
 Regardless of the song's quality and inherently universal application to positive relationship upswing sequences in fiction, it is insanely overused in said situations.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "You Make My Dreams" is a 1980 single by Hall & Oates from their album Voices. The song reached number five on the Pop Singles chart in 1981. Vocals from Hall & Oates "You Make My Dreams" were later sampled on R&B singer Amerie's song "Take Control". American pop rock band Mêlée included a cover version of "You Make My Dreams" on their album Devils & Angels.  It has been featured in the television shows The Office, Cupid, and Glee, as well as the movies Step Brothers, the documentary My Date With Drew, and The Wedding Singer.

track.name: You Make My Dreams
comments: They had a cover band in Arlington, TX that was the real deal. They played this little club and and the place shook. 1083-'86. If you ever heard them it was a real joy.
Can't stop picturing Joseph Gordon-Levitt dancing to this song...SO priceless! :D [125]
You make my dreams come true!
Could these boys save the worlds problems?  I think so.   Scrap the UN . . . just send Hall n Oates in to sing a pleasant song and problem solved, innit?
it's impossible not to remember Tom and his little dance. <3333
Can't stop picturing Joseph Gordon-Levitt dancing to this song...SO priceless! :D [124] I'm learning the dance! ;)
hall and oates is soo awesome one of my fave bands
Can't stop picturing Joseph Gordon-Levitt dancing to this song...SO priceless! :D [123]
I don't think Hall & Oates has ever made a bad song...
great song but im surprised that it got 1.5 million plays when some of their better songs arent even at .5 mil... oh well, great song choice by that movie which i have never even heard of
